_header: Almighty God in Trinity / Leave us well to speed

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Almihti god in TriniteLeeue vs wel to spedeSend vs of his holy
                    graceAnd help vs at vr nede…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þif þou beo a strong monAnd riche of worldes
                    goodDispyse þou no luytel monNe hate hym in þy
                    mod[followed by Latin and French ending ‘Suffreȝ amiste / Quaunt
                    purchase le as’]
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Her bi ginneþ luytel Caton (f. 309va); Here endet petyt
                    catoun (f. 310rb)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
…Þeore sone I schal þe techeÞe maners of my
                    wille…
